Hildur Guðnadóttir

The composer won her first award thanks to movie

Joker (2020). She was also awarded a Golden Globe and

a BAFTA for the same movie.

Rachel Portman

She has been nominated for Best Original Score

in three ocassions. First one was in 1996, for Emma.

With this movie, she became the first woman to win

an award in this category. Since 2000, she has also been

nominated for The Cider House Rules (2000) and Chocolat (2001)

Un 97.4% de los nominados son hombres, frente

a un 2.6% que son mujeres
